{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_FatAttack1}} {{doomwiki|A_FatAttack1|also=A_FatAttack2|and=A_FatAttack3}} '''A_FatAttack1''' [(string ''spawntype'')]
'''A_FatAttack2''' [(string ''spawntype'')]
'''A_FatAttack3''' [(string ''spawntype'')]
The 3 attack stages of Doom's [[Classes:Fatso|Mancubus]]. Each one shoots 2 missiles of the specified type in different directions. If no type is specified it will use [[Classes:FatShot|FatShot]] (the regular [[Classes:Fatso|Mancubus]] missile.)
'''A_FatAttack1''' will shoot one shot straight ahead, and the second 11.25 degrees to its left.
'''A_FatAttack2''' will shoot one shot straight ahead, and the second 11.25 degrees to its right.
'''A_FatAttack3''' will shoot two shots, one 5.625 degrees to the left, and the other 5.625 degrees to the right.
== Examples ==
This is the [[Classes:Fatso|Mancubus']] Missile state:
Missile: FATT G 20 [[A_FatRaise]] FATT H 10 bright [[A_FatAttack1]] // See [[Classes:FatShot|FatShot]] FATT IG 5 [[A_FaceTarget]] FATT H 10 bright [[A_FatAttack2]] FATT IG 5 [[A_FaceTarget]] FATT H 10 bright [[A_FatAttack3]] FATT IG 5 [[A_FaceTarget]] goto See
